text: Hi!! So I've been having this thing where my heart sort of flutters? Like it started on Tuesday, no wait Wednesday, because I remember I was making pasta and my mum called and we were talking about my sister's wedding which is in March btw, anyway I noticed this flutter and I googled it and WebMD said it could be like 15 different things and now I can't stop thinking about it and I also have a headache but that might be from the screen time because I've been researching this for 3 hours and my husband says I need to stop but I can't and also is this how you use this thing?? 😅

Ok so the flutter thing - do you think it's serious?? Because my aunt had heart problems but she was 70 and I'm only 38 but genetics right? And I also eat well mostly except for the chocolate but dark chocolate is good for you I read somewhere
Right yes sorry I know you can't diagnose! I just spiral. My therapist says I do this. She's lovely by the way, very patient, she's from Edinburgh originally which is random but anyway
GROUNDING yes ok that would help. Sorry for rambling. I do that when I'm anxious. What do we do?
Ok that actually helped a bit. The flutter's still there but I'm less focused on it. Is that normal?
Could you write me something short to read when I go down the Google rabbit hole? Just to remind me to step back?
thank you so much you're very helpful!! I'll try not to Google tonight. Or at least set a timer. 20 mins max. That's reasonable right?? 😬
Save that grounding worked and I need to limit Google to 20 mins and the coping card thing
